### 2013-10-20 - Wuff 0.0.0.2

- Really fixed the s24 to s16 conversion.
- Wuff now stops when it reaches the end of the data instead of reading into other chunks.


### 2013-10-20 - Wuff 0.0.0.1

- Fixed the s24 to s16 conversion.


### 2012-07-25 - Wuff 0.0.0.0

- Initial release of Wuff.
